articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Army Authorities' Moves Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Army Authorities' Moves Denounced
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Navy of the Korean People's Army solemnly declares that it will never tolerate the moves of the south Korean puppet army authorities to fix the "Northern Limit Line" (NLL) unilaterally drawn by the U.S. forces without any legal basis and prior consultation with the DPRK as the extension of the military demarcation line in sea waters but decisively counter any attempt to infringe upon its sovereignty.
					 A spokesman for the Navy Command of the KPA declared this in a statement issued on Thursday in connection with the fact that the situation in the waters off the frontal area on the west coast of Korea has become so tense that a naval clash may break out due to such military provocations as the ceaseless infiltration of warships deep into the territorial waters of the north side by the south Korean puppet army. 
					
					 The navy of the south Korean puppet army has escalated the intrusion of warships into the territorial waters of the north side since early in September, the statement noted, and went on: 
					
					 Recently, the daily average of the number of their intrusions reached three to five. On September 27, several warships intruded into the waters of the north side from Yonphyong Islet and Taechong Islet, firing shells. On October 7, seven warships and a rubber boat illegally intruded into the waters of the north side. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet army authorities are infiltrating warships into the territorial waters of the north side in a premeditated manner, openly revealing their sinister intention to "stick to" the illegal NLL unilaterally set by the U.S. forces in the territorial waters of the north in disregard of the Korean Armistice Agreement and international law half a century ago.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that no sooner had the present puppet traitor come to power than adopted the "Northern Limit Line" as a "policy," claiming that "no compromise should be made over it" from "the standpoint of the territorial conception."
					
					 The warmongers of the south Korean puppet army are gradually expanding the sphere of intrusion into the waters of the north side to the waters east of Taechong Islet and northwest of Paekryong Islet from those southwest of Yonphyong Islet. 
					
					 Their reckless military provocations and moves to preserve the NLL are rendering the situation in the West Sea of Korea so dangerous that the third West Sea skirmish and the second June 25 war may break out any moment there. 
					
					 There is always a limit to patience. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet army authorities would be well advised to think twice about what will happen if the warning and self-restraint of the north touch off resentment and lead to a decisive action. 
					
					 The Korean People's Army is closely following with utmost vigilance the movements of warships of the south Korean puppet navy and keeps itself fully combat ready to deal a crushing blow at the provocateurs any time. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet army authorities should halt at once the intrusion of their warships into the territorial waters of the north side and drop their foolish ambition to stick to the illegal NLL.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Laotian Party Leader
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Laotian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Choummaly Saynasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party who is President of the Lao People's Democratic Republic and chairman of the Central Committee of Defence and Security of Laos, on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket was conveyed to an official concerned by Laotian Ambassador to the DPRK Chaleune Warinthrasak on October 9.

articles.title: Floral Basket to WPK Central Committee from China
articles.content:
Floral Basket to WPK Central Committee from China
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Communist Party of China sent a floral basket to the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on the occasion of its 63rd anniversary.
					 The floral basket was conveyed to an official concerned by Hao Xiaofei, charge d'affaires a.i. of the Chinese embassy here, Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets and Congratulatory Messages to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets and Congratulatory Messages to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with floral baskets and congratulatory messages by the diplomatic corps and the military attaches corps in the DPRK on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They were conveyed to Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, by Pakistani Ambassador to the DPRK Noorullah Khan who is doyen of the diplomatic corps and to an official concerned by Military Attache of the Vietnam embassy here Dau Xuan Long who is doyen of the military attaches corps on Thursday.

articles.title: "Calligraphy of Poland" Exhibition Held
articles.content:
"Graphic Painting of Poland" Exhibition Held
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- "Graphic Painting of Poland" exhibition was held at the Polish embassy in Pyongyang on Thursday on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Poland.
					 Present there on invitation were officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries here.
					
					 Polish Ambassador to the DPRK Roman Iwaszkiewicz and staff members of the embassy were on hand.
					
					 The ambassador made a speech there.
					
					 The participants looked round the graphic paintings on display.

articles.title: Monument to Party Founding, Symbol of Workers' Party of Korea
articles.content:
Monument to Party Founding, Symbol of Workers' Party of Korea
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Monument to Party Founding located in Munsu Street of Pyongyang is visited by an endless stream of people on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 At least 4.2 million servicepersons, people of all strata, overseas Koreans and foreigners have seen round it since it was unveiled in October Juche 84 (1995).
					
					 The grand monument consummates the great feats of the WPK which has created a world-famous model for the accomplishment of the socialist cause and paved a new path for the founding of the revolutionary party in the Juche era over last 60-odd years.
					
					 The monument consists of the 50m-towers which depict a hammer, sickle and writing-brush held by the worker, peasant and intellectual symbolic of the components of the WPK, a circular band on which the slogan "Long live the Workers' Party of Korea which organizes and guides all victories for the Korean people!" is embossed and the foundation which means the long history of the Party. It is an edifice of the times which combines well the originality of the structure with the architectural art.
					
					 Carved in relief in the inside of the circular band are three large sculptures showing the historical root of the WPK, the might of the single-minded unity of the leader, party and masses and the fighting feature of the Korean people to carry out the human cause of independence.
					
					 The monument will shine long as a symbol of the glorious Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Brilliant Realization of Cause for Founding Independent Party
articles.content:
Brilliant Realization of Cause for Founding Independent Party
Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The cause of founding the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was carried out on the principle of independence in a unique way.
					When he started to lead the Korean revolution in the darkest period of the Japanese imperialist rule, President Kim Il Sung conceived a plan of organizing a vanguard organization of the revolution to wage an anti-Japanese national liberation struggle and formed the "Down-with-Imperialism Union" (DIU) in October Juche 15 (1926).
					
					The formation of the DIU was the starting point of the struggle for founding the revolutionary party; its programme was the basis of the programme of the WPK; its principle of independence was that of the party construction and activities; and the revolutionaries of the new generation trained by the DIU were the backbone for the party foundation.
					
					The President laid down the Juche-oriented line of the Korean revolution at the Kalun Meeting in June 1930, thus indicating the original way for founding a revolutionary party in an independent way.
					
					The principle of the party founding was to found the party by the method of organizing the basic party organization first and expanding and reinforcing it and to undertake the preparatory work for the party founding in close combination with the anti-Japanese struggle. The principle could be laid down for the first time only by the President who waged the revolutionary struggle by organizing and mobilizing the popular masses with the faith that the internal force of the revolution is the people. 
					
					The President formed the first party organization, the Society for Rallying Comrades, the origin of the Workers' Party of Korea, in early July of 1930 and expanded the party organization with it as a parent body. 
					
					As a result, a party organization was formed with members of revolutionary organizations in the area of Onsong in early October of 1930 and many basic party organizations came into being in armed ranks and in the area of East Manchuria nearby the River Tuman and in the northern border area in a short span of time.
					
					Right after reorganizing the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army into the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) in March 1934, the President took an epochal step of instituting the party committee of the KPRA so as to control and guide local party organizations as well as the party organizations of all levels in the army units.
					
					Party organizations were organized in the units of the KPRA and vast areas inside and outside the country and linked with the headquarters of the Korean revolution in an organizational way, with the result that the party's leadership over the Korean revolution as a whole was established with success and the anti-Japanese national liberation struggle was brought to uninterrupted upswing.
					
					Basing himself on the success and experience accumulated in the party building during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, the President saw to it that party organizations were organized in different local areas immediately after the liberation of the country and formed the central organizing committee of the Communist Party of North Korea on October 10, 1945.
					
					It was a historic event in accomplishment of the cause of party founding which had been carried on for many years under the guidance of the President.

articles.title: Ryongwang Pavilion, Scenic Beauty of Pyongyang
articles.content:
Ryongwang Pavilion, Scenic Beauty of Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- There are lots of spots of scenic beauty and historic interest in Pyongyang with a long history spanning 50 centuries, among them the Ryongwang Pavilion, one of the eight scenic wonders in North and South Phyongan Provinces and Jagang Province.
					 The pavilion standing on the picturesque bank of the River Taedong, fitting in pretty well with its surroundings, was built in the period of Koguryo (277 B.C. - 668 A.D.) along with the Pyongyang Wall.  It is said to have been reconstructed several times. 
					
					 For its superb beauty, it is called "Jeilrudae", "Manhwaru" and so on. It is a cultural asset showing the excellent architecture of the Korean nation.
					
					 The pavilion of peculiar style consists of the southern and northern wings with lifted floors supported by 11 and 9 pillars respectively. It has a hanging board with the characters "the most beautiful mountains and rivers in the world" written by a foreign envoy. 
					
					 Graceful is the outside view of the pavilion with its two hip-saddle roofs fitted together at a right angle. And the railing around the lifted wooden floor, the girders with silk patterns painted red and blue and every other element of the pavilion strike the visitors with wonders for its exquisite work.
					
					 The pavilion conveys various stories including the famous anecdote that Kim Hwang Won, a well-known poet in the period of the Koryo Dynasty (918-1392), broke his brush, regretting his inability to depict the scenic beauty of its surroundings and an episode telling the patriotism of General Kim Ung So and a woman Kye Wol Hyang who killed a boss of the Japanese aggressive army in the period of Imjin Patriotic War (1592-1598).
					
					 The pavilion forms a district of cultural relics together with the Taedong Gate, the Bell-house of the Pyongyang Bell, the Monument to Kye Wol Hyang and the Paek Son Haeng Memorial House. It was severely damaged by indiscriminate bombings of the U.S. imperialists during the Fatherland Liberation War, but was rehabilitated soon after the war under the government's policy of preserving national culture and is now cared for as a national treasure.
					
					 Today an endless stream of working people of all strata, school youth and children and foreigners flows to the pavilion.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Remarks Denounced
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Remarks Denounced
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The second assistant director of the "National Intelligence Service" of south Korea, addressing lawmakers a few days ago, let loose a string of virulent outbursts that "south Korea could not go to an advanced society without eliminating the pro-north left-wing forces". These remarks come under fire by signed commentaries of leading newspapers Thursday. 
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the "pro-north left-wing forces" touted by the fascist maniac are those who desire reconciliation and unity between the north and the south and struggle for independent reunification. These reckless remarks should never be overlooked as they are extremely fascist and provocative outbursts calling for bringing charges against the patriotic pro-reunification democratic forces and punishing all of them on charges of groundless linkage with the north.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group, which adopted the sycophancy towards the U.S. and anti-reunification as its policy, is getting evermore frantic in the brutal crackdown upon the patriotic pro-reunification democratic forces in a bid to eliminate them, staking their fate on the north-south confrontation.
					
					 What matters is that the Lee group is actively plugging the "National Intelligence Service" into the anti-reunification crackdown.
					
					 Lurking behind this campaign is a criminal intention to savagely suppress and stamp out the pro-reunification democratic forces of various strata in south Korea by linking them with the north in a bid to stay in power and aggravate the north-south confrontation. What was uttered by the above-said intelligence official is an open declaration of his plan to throw all progressive and patriotic organizations and people standing in the way of the implementation of the anti-reunification policy behind bars and a horrifying declaration of a war against the pro-reunification democratic forces.
					
					 This self-exposed that the Lee group is an anti-reunification group of traitors disqualified to live in the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 The reality eloquently proves that it is impossible to achieve independent and democratic development of south Korean society and reconciliation and unity between the compatriots and reunification unless they foil the Lee Myung Bak regime's treacherous and provocative fascist crackdown being perpetrated in south Korea under the pretext of any linkage with the north.
					
					 Minju Joson observes: The Lee group is busy suppressing pro-reunification patriotic forces, claiming that members of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea praised the Juche idea and the system in the north and conducted information service in favor of them and they carried out their activities at the "instructions" from the north. This is a prelude to the wholesale fascist crackdown to eliminate those forces.

articles.title: Songun Politics Praised as Treasured Sword for National Security and Peace
articles.content:
Songun Politics Praised as Treasured Sword for National Security and Peace
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Songun politics pursued by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is a powerful treasured sword for peace which is able to frustrate any military challenge of any imperialist aggression forces.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 The U.S. regarding "strength" as almighty is attempting to realize its wild ambition for domination over the DPRK by military strength, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The WPK's Songun politics mercilessly deals a telling blow based on arms of justice at the aggressors seeking to violate the sovereignty of the nation. It also reliably defends the nation's sovereignty, dignity and vital rights with the invincible military capabilities from any infringement by outside forces.
					
					 The Songun politics put an end to the distress-torn history of the Korean nation in which its dignity and sovereignty was violated by outside forces as national strength was weak. It is resolutely smashing the criminal moves of the U.S. imperialists who have run amuck to enslave the whole Korean nation after occupying south Korea.
					
					 Now the U.S. dare not touch even a blade of grass or a tree in the DPRK. The DPRK is demonstrating its might as a military power, frustrating the U.S. highhanded and arbitrary practices on the strength of Songun. This reality proves once again that it is nothing but the Songun politics that is able to defend the sovereignty of the country and the nation and the security of all the Koreans.
					
					 But for arms of Songun, the DPRK would have failed to defend the red flag of socialism and many wars would have broken out in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is the great fortune and high pride of the Korean nation to have such invincible treasured sword, a powerful weapon for defending the nation, as arms of Songun. Thanks to the strong arms of Songun, the dignity and glory of the Korean nation is getting higher, its consciousness of independence and self-esteem growing stronger and its cause of independent reunification vigorously advancing.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Leadership over WPK Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Leadership over WPK Praised
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea has fully demonstrated its might as the most dignified and invincible revolutionary party as it is led by Kim Jong Il, great brilliant commander of Songun.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a signed article.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the great statesman as he has developed the WPK into an invincible revolutionary party with his rare wisdom and seasoned leadership, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The servicepersons and people of the DPRK clearly notice Kim Jong Il's distinguished personality as a great man in the appearance of the WPK demonstrating its dignity as the party of President Kim Il Sung and the invincible and iron-willed party.
					
					 The wise leadership provided by Kim Jong Il to develop the WPK into an ever-victorious revolutionary party finds its expression in the fact that he has guided the WPK to firmly preserve its revolutionary character as the party of the President.
					
					 It is leading the revolution and construction to victory guided by the revolutionary idea of the President with the high dignity as his party under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il. Its guiding idea is the Juche idea, Songun idea of the President and its cause is the cause of Juche, the cause of Songun revolution started by him.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's wise leadership also finds its manifestation in the fact that he saw to it that the Party remarkably increased its militant function and role as required by the new era of Songun revolution and a fresh turn was effected in the working methods and style of the officials.
					
					 The WPK guided by the great leader is a revolutionary party all members of which are armed with the Juche idea, Songun idea and they live and struggle in the spirit of devotedly defending the headquarters of the revolution. It is also an invincible revolutionary party which has a strong political foundation, army-people unity with the People's Army as the core and a militant party which has brought about epoch-making miracles and changes in building a great prosperous powerful nation by the Songun political mode.
					
					 The cause of building a great prosperous powerful nation in the DPRK is sure to triumph thanks to the seasoned leadership of the Party and the revolutionary army and people who thoroughly implement the plan and intention of the leader, concludes the article.

articles.title: DPRK Founding Anniversary Celebrated
articles.content:
DPRK Founding Anniversary Celebrated
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the DPRK took place in more than 80 countries and by international and regional organizations.
					 Last year a seminar held in Romania to support the DPRK stressed the need to organize events for celebrating its 60th birthday and a preparatory committee for celebrating the anniversary was formed in the Czech Republic with the attendance of personages of political and public circles. Following them, preparations for celebrating Sept. 9, the birthday of the DPRK, were accelerated on a full scale in different parts of the world this year.
					
					 Preparatory committees to celebrate the DPRK founding anniversary were organized in more than 30 countries including India, Bangladesh, Denmark, the United Kingdom, Democratic Congo and Nigeria. The committees were made up of prominent figures of governments, political parties and organizations. And the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain formed a preparatory committee for seminar through Internet.
					
					 The Secretariat of the C.C., the Communist Party of the Soviet Union announced "On the occasion of the 60th birthday of the DPRK", a resolution on widely introducing the immortal feats of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and conducting colorful events.
					
					 The Office of the Presidential Envoy to Los Rios Province of Ecuador decided to award the title of honorary citizen and the key of the province to Kim Jong Il and the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party a congratulatory message to him. Meanwhile, the Nepal Journalist Association presented the Nepalese International Peace Prize to him.
					
					 Congratulatory statements were issued by the Workers' Party of Bangladesh and the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, the Switzerland-Korea Committee, the chairman of the National Executive Committee of the Polish Communist Party, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, the secretary general of the People's Unity Party of Tunisia, the chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association and other political parties and organizations and personages of different circles.
					
					 The presidents of Nepal, Dominica and Guinea warmly congratulated the Korean people on the 60th birthday of the DPRK when they met the DPRK ambassadors to their countries.
					
					 Events of laying floral baskets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung took place in Russia and Cuba and by the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America. And floral baskets in the name of heads of state and political parties, government ministries, institutions and organizations and individuals of different countries were placed before portraits of the peerlessly great men at the DPRK embassies.
					
					 Representatives of governments, political parties and organizations and prominent figures of various countries visited the DPRK missions to celebrate the DPRK birthday.
					
					 Over 300 colorful events for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the DPRK were held across the world amid the deep concern of the progressive humankind.

articles.title: Proposal for Founding DFRK and October 4 Declaration Supported
articles.content:
Proposal for Founding DFRK and October 4 Declaration Supported
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea issued a statement on Oct. 2 on the occasion of the 28th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) and the first anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 The statement said that it was the great historic feat performed by President Kim Il Sung that he advanced the proposal for founding the DFRK on the basis of a deep analysis of the issue of the country's reunification, thus making it possible for the Koreans to reunify their country by their own efforts.
					
					 Noting that General Secretary Kim Jong Il formulated the proposal for founding the DFRK as a major part of the three charters for national reunification, the statement said that the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration which were published at the historic north-south summit meetings that took place thanks to his bold decision gave a powerful impetus to the movement for Korea's reunification.
					
					 The statement continued:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group hell-bent on sycophancy toward the U.S. is not only denying the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration but is checking cooperation and exchange between the north and the south. It is also pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme pitch of tension, pursuant to the U.S. imperialists' policy to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The world progressive forces should urge the south Korean authorities to opt for implementing the above-said declarations but never allow the Lee group to pursue its bellicose anti-reunification policy.
					
					 They should strongly demand the U.S. stop throwing a hurdle in the way of the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula, sincerely honor its commitments, roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and withdraw its aggression forces from south Korea without delay.
					
					 Solidarity rallies, seminars and lectures took place in Mongolia and Ethiopia from Sept. 22 to Oct. 3 on the above-said occasions.

articles.title: WPK's Anniversary Observed in South Africa
articles.content:
WPK's Anniversary Observed in South Africa
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party who is chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, issued a statement on Oct. 1 on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 He in the statement said that the WPK has earned fame as an ever-victorious party that has achieved the single-minded unity of all members of society for the first time in human history.
					
					 There were parties with long history in the world but in view of the past and present it is only the WPK that has achieved the steel-strong unity and solidarity by rallying all people in one mind, it said, and continued:
					
					 I think that the unity of a nation depends on the distinguished political caliber of the leader of a party and his popular political idea.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the WPK, set it as his political idea to believe in people as in Heaven and has shaped policies by reflecting their wishes, always finding himself among them to ensure that everything serves them.
					
					 Under his wise leadership all members of the society have formed an organizational and integral whole centering on the leader based on the monolithic ideology and this has developed into single-minded unity based on the sense of moral obligation in the DPRK.
					
					 The socialist cause in the DPRK will make steady victorious progress despite whatever storm and stress thanks to the single-minded unity stronger than a nuclear weapon.

articles.title: Birthday of WPK Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Birthday of WPK Observed in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Bulletins were issued by friendship organizations in Sri Lanka, Egypt and Bulgaria on Oct. 1 and 3 on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the WPK.
					 The Sri Lanka-People's Korea Friendship Association released the 23rd issue of its bulletin "Juche Korea" which carried an article titled "Fluttering Flag of the Workers' Party of Korea".
					
					 The article noted that the more than six decades-long history of the WPK may be called a history in which it has made a steady victorious and glorious advance holding aloft its flag emblazoned with a hammer, sickle and writing brush. 
					
					 Thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il the history and tradition of the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung are given a steady continuity, the bulletin noted, adding that it is fully demonstrating its might as an organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people.
					
					 The Egypt-Korea Friendship Association in its bulletin carried articles titled "The Workers' Party of Korea has emerged a guide of the Songun revolution" and "The Workers' Party of Korea advancing under the uplifted banner of independence against imperialism." They referred to the deep trust and great expectation of the world progressives towards the WPK advancing under the uplifted banner of independence against imperialism.
					
					 The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association in its bulletin carried an article captioned "63rd Anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea." It introduced the feats Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by founding and strengthening the WPK.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Pro-Reunification Organizations under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Pro-Reunification Organizations under Fire
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Chairman of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia Ju Hui Chol issued a statement on Oct. 4 to accuse the Lee Myung Pak group of traitors of intensifying as never before the suppression of progressive organizations for the reunification movement in south Korea these days. 
					 The statement recalled that the group mobilized the puppet National Intelligence Service and police to search the offices of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration under the pretext that it praised the Juche idea and the reality of the DPRK and arrested its leading members to threaten them to tell about "forces behind it."
					
					 Noting that the association is vehemently condemning the moves of the group against the nation and reunification, the statement continued:
					
					 The group has totally prevented the inter-Korean relations from making sound progress and stepped up the war moves against fellow countrymen in league with the U.S. imperialists, letting loose without hesitation outbursts that "it would regain the lost decade" as soon as it took office. 
					
					 The group should know properly that its frantic moves against the nation and reunification would only precipitate its own self-destruction. 
					
					 The group should face up to the trend of the times and stop at once the moves against compatriots and the suppression of the above-said organizations, the statement urged.

articles.title: First Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Marked in U.S.
articles.content:
First Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Marked in U.S.
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- An event was held by Koreans in the United States on October 5 on the occasion of the first anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration. 
					 Present there were representatives of organizations of Koreans in America including the Western Committee of the U.S. Regional Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the U.S. Headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification and the Western Regional Association of Koreans in America. 
					
					 An address was made by Yang Un Sik, permanent chairman of the committee, at the event to be followed by other speeches.
					
					 Speakers said that since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration the work for reconciliation and cooperation has been brisk between the south and the north and the movement for national reunification has made dynamic progress. 
					
					 But the Lee Myung Bak regime in south Korea is working hard to turn back the clock of history by bringing back the era of the Cold War and confrontation, making a mess of all the above-said achievements.
					
					 They accused the Lee group of staging madcap joint military exercises for aggression against fellow countrymen, while crying out for "cooperation" with outside forces, and brutally suppressing the progressive organizations for the reunification movement on charges of violation of the "National Security Law".
					
					 The history will advance despite any obstructive moves and independence and reunification are sure to come true, they noted, calling on all the Koreans in America to pool efforts and turn out in the struggle for reunification. 
					
					 They urged Lee Myung Bak to place the interests of the nation above anything else, though belatedly, and opt to implement the above-said declarations as early as possible.

articles.title: Portavoz militar condena intento del ejercito titere surcoreano
articles.content:
Portavoz militar condena intento del ejercito titere surcoreano
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ATCC) -- Las fuerzas navales del Ejercito Popular de Corea declaran solemnemente que no perdonaran ni en lo minimo el comportamiento de las autoridades militares titeres del Sur de Corea para convertir en la linea maritima de demarcacion militar la "linea de limite al Norte", trazada unilateralmente por las tropas norteamericanas sin ningun fundamento legal ni la consulta previa con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sino enfrentaran rotundamente a cualquier intento de violar nuestra soberania.
					  Subrayo el portavoz de la Comandancia de las Fuerzas Navales del EPC en su declaracion publicada este jueves con motivo de que en las aguas del frente en el Mar Oeste de Corea se crea la situacion tan aguda capaz de generar un conflicto debido al ejercito titere surcoreano que comete la provocacion militar al mandar sucesivamente sus buques de combate a lo profundo de las aguas jurisdiccionales de la parte Norte. 
					
					  En los ultimos dias, se reportan como promedio diario 3-5 casos de la penetracion de buques surcoreanos en nuestras aguas jurisdiccionales, que vino ampliandose de manera escalonada desde principios de septiembre, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					 El 27 de septiembre, varios buques surcoreanos infiltrados desde las islas Yonphyong y Taechong cometieron el acto provocativo de abrir hasta el fuego artillero.
					
					 El 7 de octubre, invadieron ilegalmente nuestras aguas jurisdiccionales 7 buques de combate y bote de goma.
					
					  Mediante esta intrusion premeditada, las autoridades militares titeres del Sur de Corea exponen mas abiertamente su siniestra intencion de "mantener" la ilegal e ilegitima "linea de limite al Norte", que las tropas norteamericanas delinearon hace medio siglo en el mar jurisdiccional de la RPDC sin tomar en consideracion el Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea ni la ley internacional.
					
					  Lo que no podemos pasar por alto es que tan pronto como tomara el "poder", el actual mandatario traidor y titere formulo la "linea" en cuestion en una "politica" tildandola como "asunto en que no se debe ceder nunca partiendo de la concepcion territorial".  
					
					　 Los belicistas surcoreanos amplian poco a poco la zona de intrusion contra nuestra parte desde la zona maritima al sudoeste de la isla Yonphyong al este de la isla Taechong y al noroeste de la isla Paekryong.
					
					   Debido a las temerarias provocaciones militares de ellos  y  sus maniobras para  mantener la "linea de limite al Norte",  en el Mar Oeste de Corea se da la situacion tan tirante que puede estallar en cualquier momento el tercer conflicto del mar oeste y la segunda guerra del 25 de junio. 
					
					  La paciencia tambien tiene su limite.
					
					  Las autoridades militares titeres del Sur de Corea deben reflexionar seriamente de las consecuencias que se produciran cuando nuestra advertencia y paciencia exploten con rencor y pasen a la accion decidida.
					
					  En estos momentos tambien el EPC observa agudamente con alta vigilancia los movimientos de buques de las fuerzas navales titeres surcoreanas y mantiene la perfecta disposicion combativa para asestar en cualquier momento un demoledor golpe a los provocadores.
					
					  Las autoridades militares titeres surcoreanas deben poner inmediatamente fin a la intrusion en las aguas jurisdiccionales de la parte Norte y abandonar su estupida ilusion de mantener la ilegal "linea de limite al Norte".

Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de  secretario general de CC de PPRL

Kim Jong Il recibe cestos de flores y cartas de  huespedes extranjeros

articles.title: Periodicos denuncian a la banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Periodicos denuncian a la banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ATCC) -- Los periodicos centrales publicaron este jueves los comentarios individuales denunciando al segundo subdirector del "Servicio de Inteligencia" del Sur de Corea quien en su reciente "entrevista con los parlamentarios" dijo que "no se puede marchar hacia la sociedad avanzada sin eliminar a las fuerzas izquierdistas pronorcoreanas".
					Las "fuerzas" mencionadas por este fascista son los hombres que aspiran a la reconciliacion y la unidad entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea y luchan por la reunificacion independiente, comienza el diario Rodong Sinmun y prosigue:
					
					  Por lo tanto, no se puede tolerar jamas ese disparate sumamente fascista y provocativo que aboga por incriminar y ejecutar a todas las fuerzas patrioticas democraticas pro-reunificacion vinculandolas con el Norte de Corea.
					
					  La banda de Lee, que concreto en una politica el servilismo proyanqui y la anti-reunificacion  sustentandose de la confrontacion fratricida, recrudece cada dia mas la ensangrentada campana represiva contra esas fuerzas.
					
					  Lo mas grave del caso es que el "Servicio de Inteligencia" toma parte activa en esa acometida a las ordenes de la banda de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					  Detras de esto se halla la intencion criminal de esta horda de reprimir y eliminar salvajemente a las fuerzas democraticas pro-reunificacion de distintos sectores del Sur de Corea relacionandolas con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para mantenerse en el Poder y agravar el enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					  El disparate en cuestion significa la macabra declaracion de guerra contra las fuerzas democraticas pro-reunificacion consistente en arrestar a todas las entidades y habitantes progresistas y patrioticos que constituyan el escollo en la realizacion de la politica anti-reunificacion.
					
					  De esta manera, la banda de Lee mostro su fachada de traidores opositores a la reunificacion que no pueden ni deben existir en la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio.
					
					  La realidad comprueba elocuentemente que sin frustrar esa campana antinacional y provocativa del "regimen" de Lee, no se puede lograr jamas el desarrollo independiente y democratico de la sociedad surcoreana ni la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion entre los connacionales.    
					
					Por su parte, el rotativo Minju Joson escribe que la banda de Lee Myung Bak perpetra directamente la confiscacion, el registro y el arresto forzado contra los miembros de la Solidaridad de Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta Sur-Norte alegando que estos elogiaron y propagaron la idea Juche y el sistema de la RPDC y actuaron a las "ordenes" de esta.
					
					Esto deviene el preludio de la gran campana represiva contra las fuerzas patrioticas partidarias de la reunificacion, subraya.
